body: This is outrageous and players arent getting compensated for the amount of bull people deal with. Im not saying give us rp skins wards what ever i dont  care just something for people who are trying to make a job from gaming or for people who are already getting paid to stream. Please  fix this and provide something for people who get bugs

replies.body: Alot of people suffering from this issue it seems , please fix it!

Technical issues can definitely be frustrating when they prevent you from getting in-game. In your case, it looks like the issue is caused by a poor connection to the League servers. Not to worry! This is typically resolvable by working through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if this fixed your issues.

Ive done this before and yet it still continues to come back. Now im put into a low priority que as a result and im worried i will get banned when the only way to check to see if it works is to try. I cant continue to play if its going to risk my account and all the money ive put on it.

I've never seen a case where someone's account was permabanned for leaving, so I think it's okay for you to continue testing fixes in custom matches. Since you're still experiencing issues, I'd like to escalate this to our tech team in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attaching them to your ticket so the specialist has more context on what's going on.

Let me know if you run into any issues.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/25542276 

Ive sent up the support ticket I thank you for your time. Im just tried of this happening and its costing me the ability to spread my stream
Also for people who get these fixes automatically without doing any of these steps would that be considered an issue some place else and not with the network connection
